We’ve also added quite a few surprises in the app, go find them!

In this version, you are still able to export the videos from the draft box. However, we are not going to support this function in the next version. In case you might lose your drafted videos, please export them as soon as possible. Thank you for your cooperation.

In this version, you are still able to export the videos from the draft box. However, we are not going to support this function in the next version. In case you might lose your drafted videos, please export them as soon as possible. Thank you for your cooperation.
